channel.title: Two Problems
channel.description:
1)So I've put the Corporal Beastro Express Smiley on my server but!! It won't hit all the time.. This is how his hits would go for example.
0-0-0-0-43-0-0-0-29-0-0-0-0-0-19
I want to make it so it goes for example like this;
10-43-15-22-34-0-33-0-0-12
Like you know... Accurate..
2)I have the Gnome Pilot and when you talk to him he opens up the map.. But the buttons aren't working.. For exemple, if you click on godwars.. It won't do anything.

item.title: Two Problems
item.dc:creator: @dirtynife dirtynife
item.description:
@dirtynife wrote:

1)So I’ve put the Corporal Beastro Express Smiley on my server but!! It won’t hit all the time… This is how his hits would go for example.

0-0-0-0-43-0-0-0-29-0-0-0-0-0-19

I want to make it so it goes for example like this;

10-43-15-22-34-0-33-0-0-12

Like you know… Accurate…

2)I have the Gnome Pilot and when you talk to him he opens up the map… But the buttons aren’t working… For exemple, if you click on godwars… It won’t do anything.

Read full topic
